articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: NBA roundup: Hornets survive Doncic, Mavs in OT
articles.description: Terry Rozier scored 29 points, and Devonte' Graham added 27 as the visiting Charlotte Hornets opened a 20-point first-half lead and still had to rally for a 123-120 overtime victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Terry Rozier scored 29 points, and Devonte’ Graham added 27 as the visiting Charlotte Hornets opened a 20-point first-half lead and still had to rally for a 123-120 overtime victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday night.

articles.title: Man killed in fatal shark attack in Australia
articles.description: A man died after being attacked by a shark off Australia's southwest coast on Sunday, officials said, adding that patrols of the area would be increased.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - A man died after being attacked by a shark off Australia’s southwest coast on Sunday, officials said, adding that patrols of the area would be increased.

articles.title: Kenya says starts spraying of locusts seen as threat to food security
articles.description: Kenya said on Saturday it had started aerial spraying in three counties in the country's north to try to head off a locust invasion which has already caused extensive damage to farmland in neighbouring Somalia and Ethiopia.

articles.title: Fourteen killed in bomb attack on bus convoy in Burkina Faso
articles.description: Fourteen people were killed and 19 wounded when a bus carrying students ran over an improvised explosive device on Saturday in northern Burkina Faso, the government said.
